class.name: InteractiveGrid
class.brief_description: InteractiveGrid is a Godot GDExtension that allows player interaction with a 3D grid, including cell selection, pathfinding, and hover highlights.
class.description: — Highlight cells when hovering the mouse over them. — Select individual cells. — Detect obstacles (collision mask configurable from the editor). — Align cells with the floor (collision mask configurable from the editor). — Hide distant cells to focus on the relevant area. — Calculate paths from a global position to selected cells using AStar2D. — Choose movement type: 4 directions, 6 directions, 8 directions, directly from the editor. — Customize the grid from the editor: grid size, cell size, mesh, colors, and shaders. — High performance using MultiMeshInstance3D for efficient rendering of multiple cells.

method.name: center
method.description: Called to re-center the grid. This also resets the grid state.

method.name: compute_unreachable_cells
method.description: Iterates over all grid cells and marks as unreachable those cells that cannot be reached from the specified start cell. Updates the visual representation by applying `_unreachable_color` to the grid's MultiMesh. Unreachable cells are not marked as unwalkable to allow gameplay features such as teleportation.

method.name: get_cell_global_position
method.description: Returns the global world‑space position of the cell identified by index.

method.name: get_cell_index_from_global_position
method.description: Returns the linear index of the grid cell that is closest to the supplied world‑space position.

method.name: get_grid_center_global_position
method.description: Returns the central position of the interactive grid in world coordinates.

method.name: get_latest_selected
method.description: Returns the most recently selected cell.

method.name: get_neighbors
method.description: Returns the indices of neighboring cells for the specified grid cell.

method.name: get_path
method.description: Computes a path between two cells on the grid using A* pathfinding.

method.name: get_selected_cells
method.description: Returns an array of all cells currently marked as selected.

method.name: hide_distant_cells
method.description: Iterates over all grid cells and hides those located farther than the specified distance from the start cell. Marks them as non-walkable.

method.name: highlight_on_hover
method.description: Updates the hover highlight state based on the specified global position. Identifies the corresponding cell, clears any previous hover, and applies the hover color unless the cell is already selected.

method.name: highlight_path
method.description: Highlights a given path on the grid by changing the color of each cell along the path to the predefined path color.

method.name: is_cell_hovered
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as hovered.

method.name: is_cell_reachable
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as unreachable.

method.name: is_cell_selected
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as selected.

method.name: is_cell_visible
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as visible.

method.name: is_cell_walkable
method.description: Returns true if the cell at the specified index is currently marked as walkable.

method.name: is_grid_created
method.description: Checks if the grid has been created.

method.name: is_hover_enabled
method.description: Checks whether hover functionality is currently disabled on the grid.

method.name: is_visible
method.description: Checks whether the grid is currently visible in the scene.

method.name: reset_cells_state
method.description: Resets the state of all cells in the grid to their default flags.

method.name: select_cell
method.description: Selects a grid cell based on a world‑space position.

method.name: set_cell_color
method.description: Sets the color of a specific cell in the interactive grid.

method.name: set_cell_reachable
method.description: Sets whether a given grid cell is unreachable.

method.name: set_cell_walkable
method.description: Sets whether a specific cell is walkable or not.

method.name: set_hover_enabled
method.description: Enables or disables hover functionality on the grid.

method.name: set_visible
method.description: Sets the visibility of the grid.
